title: An Act authorizing the Massachusetts Department of Transportation to convey a certain parcel of land in the town of Stoneham

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Day of Stoneham, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3312) of Michael S. Day and Jason M. Lewis that the Massachusetts Department of Transportation be authorized to convey a certain parcel of land in the town of Stoneham for the purposes of reconstructing an off-ramp from Interstate Route 93 northbound.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 04/09/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on House Ways and Means
the committee on House Ways and Means

actions.description: Committee recommended ought to pass with an amendment,substituting therefor a bill with the same title, see H4643
Referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling with the amendment pending

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling with the amendment pending

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting for a second reading with the amendment pending
Read second, amended (as recommended by the committee on House Ways and Means)
